name: My EDPS Container
postStartCommand: port=7860; gui=$(find . -name 'edps-gui.py'); panel serve $gui --plugins edpsgui.pdf_handler --address 0.0.0.0 --port $port --allow-websocket-origin='*' >& /home/user/edps-gui.log & repo_name=$(basename $GITHUB_REPOSITORY); echo Run the GUI at: https://${CODESPACE_NAME}-${port}.${GITHUB_CODESPACES_PORT_FORWARDING_DOMAIN}/${repo_name}
